numericalExperiment.rationale: To explore the degree to which future climate states depend on the initial climate state (from 'A Summary of the CMIP5 Experiment Design' by Karl Taylor et al. 2008)

numericalRequirement.name: 6.6.ic
numericalRequirement.description: Initial conditions are from year 1979 of experiment 3.2_historical.

numericalRequirement.name: 6.6.bc.wmg_anth.conc
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of historical anthropogenic well mixed gases, including CO2

numericalRequirement.name: 6.6.bc.wmg_volc.conc
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of historical volcanic well mixed gases, including CO2

numericalRequirement.name: 6.6.bc.sls.conc
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of historical short lived gas species

numericalRequirement.name: 6.6.bc.aer_nat.conc
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of historical natural aerosols

numericalRequirement.name: 6.6.bc.aer_anth.conc
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of historical anthropogenic aerosols

numericalRequirement.name: 6.6.bc.aer_pre_nat.conc
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of historical natural aerosol precursors

numericalRequirement.name: 6.6.bc.aer_pre_anth.conc
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of historical anthropogenic aerosol precursors

numericalRequirement.name: 6.6.bc.sls.em
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing emissions of historical short lived gas species

numericalRequirement.name: 6.6.bc.aer_nat.em
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing emissions of historical natural aerosols

numericalRequirement.name: 6.6.bc.aer_anth.em
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing emissions of historical anthropogenic aerosols

numericalRequirement.name: 6.6.SeaIce.obs
numericalRequirement.description: Sea ice imposed from historical observations

numericalRequirement.name: 6.6.bc.sstpattern
numericalRequirement.description: Patterned SST perturbation applied to the AMIP SSTs of expt 3.3 (provided by CFMIP)
